It does work, just remember to ALT or OPTION (on mac) click on "Restore" and select the .ipsw file. So DONT click on the UPDATE or CHECK FOR UPDATES button. That will give an error.

Step 1: Enter http://www.apple.com/itunes/ and download iTunes 1.5
Step 2: DOWNLOAD!
Step 3: Download this torrent.
Step 4: Connect your iPhone.
Step 5: After the iOS 5 is downloaded; open iTunes, for PC hold "shift" and press "Restore". Search for this iOS 5 update, press.
For Mac; open iTunes: hold "alt" and press "Restore" and search for this iOS 5 update, press.
Step 6: Let the piece of shit update and enfuckingjoy!
